definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: As night falls, the hall will be swamped by people.
sentences.chinese: 一入夜，這個大廳就會人潮如湧。

sentences.english: After night fell we drove slowly along, picking our way until we found the right turn.
sentences.chinese: 入夜後我們開着車小心前進，直到發現該拐彎的地方。

sentences.english: At night, zhaoqing alone at the bow, the past oscillated memory.
sentences.chinese: 入夜，肇慶單獨彷徨在船頭，往事記憶猶新。

sentences.english: Your only option at night is to take a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 即使只有幾個街口之遙，入夜後搭計程車是唯一選擇。

sentences.english: About 10 minutes later, the enclosure's lights were turned off for the evening.
sentences.chinese: 大概十分鐘後，場地裏的燈光因爲入夜後被關掉了。

sentences.english: At night, the village drum phase smell, people indulge in song and dance, boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 入夜，村寨鼓樂相聞，人們縱情歌舞，熱鬧非凡。

sentences.english: The second chapter centers on Hughie and Long Day's Journey into Night.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析《休吉》和《長日入夜行》。

sentences.english: The soldiers were prohellobited from leaving camp after dark.
sentences.chinese: 入夜後士兵禁絕離開營房。

sentences.english: In addition, night and rain also made slow progress in rescue work.
sentences.chinese: 另外，入夜和雨勢也使救援工作進展緩慢。

sentences.english: The musical fountain after nightfall, with the symphony and dance rhythms.
sentences.chinese: 入夜後的音樂噴泉，隨着交響樂的節奏而翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: There is confusion over how the violence escalated after dark.
sentences.chinese: 現在就入夜後暴力是如何升級的仍舊衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: As night falls, Qionghua sneaks into the enemy's den to get in contact with Xiao Pang.
sentences.chinese: 入夜，瓊花悄悄進入匪巢與小龐聯絡。

definition: early evening when lanterns are first lit
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
color of the sky/time of day, as indicated by the color of the sky/weather
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
